item.description:
**********************************

Agenda:

**********************************

Presenter:  Fuming Shih   20-30 min

The project that will be presented is called "SaveFace" which crawls all your facebook data (not including images) and save them as RDF in a triple store and ready for SPARQL query. This project used Joseki for the SPARQL endpoint.  

 

Group Discussion -- Suggestions for 2012

The Organizers would like to hear from the group ideas about topics for presentations, agenda items, etc., for 2012 and beyond. To get us started, here are just a few items to consider:

* Vendor panel (short presentations by a panel of 3-5 vendors, followed by discussion/Q&A

* Semantic Web and Big Data

* Semantic Web in <insert your favorite domain here>

(Ted will moderate)
item.how_to_find_us: Rm 32-D463, 4th floor, Star Conference Room, Stata Center, MIT
item.name: Cambridge Semantic Web Monthly Meetup
